meanings.definition: The last letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the word 'zeta', 'omegas' comes at the end.
meanings.sent2: I learned about 'omegas' in my Greek language class.
meanings.sent3: The race to the finish line felt like a sprint to the 'omegas'.
meanings.sent4: As the story reached its 'omegas', the mystery was finally revealed.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to the 'omegas' where the X marked the spot.

meanings.definition: The twenty-fourth letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The word 'omegas' is pronounced differently in Greek.
meanings.sent2: Learning the alphabet, I found 'omegas' to be the last letter.
meanings.sent3: The children sang the alphabet song, ending with 'omegas' in unison.
meanings.sent4: In the spelling bee, the contestant confidently spelled 'omegas'.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf was organized with 'omegas' at the very end.

meanings.sent1: The completion of the puzzle was the 'omegas' of the game.
meanings.sent2: After a long journey, reaching home felt like the 'omegas' of the trip.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was kept secret until the 'omegas' of the night.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, casting a golden glow, it was the 'omegas' of a perfect day.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the fireworks show was the 'omegas' of the event.
